content.rendered:
Directed by Majid Majidi

Written by Vishal Bhardwaj. Mehran Kashani. Majid Majidi

Cast Ishaan Khattar (Amir). Malavika Mohanan (Tara). Goutam Ghose (Akshi). Sharada (Pati (Akshi’s Mother)). Tannishtha Chatterjee (Chotu’s Mother). Shashank Shende (Rahoul). Hema Singh(Warden). Akash Gopal (Anil). Dhwani Rajesh(Tanisha (as Dwani Rajesh)). Amruta Santosh Thakur (Asha). Shivam Pujari (Chotu) . Kavitta Amarjeett ((as Kavita Murkar)). Raymond D’Souza (Friend). Anita Goswami (Prisoner). Mia Maelzer (Jail Inmate). Kaushiki Mishra (Amir’s Neighbor).Manisha Mishra. Yogendra Singh Parmar (Rahoul’s Goon). Satyajeet Rajput (Boss).Heeba Shah. Jaspal Sharma (Amir’s Friend). Mahendra Shrivas (Prison Police Constable). Sanjay Tripathi (Cop)

Languages Hindi. English

Producers Kishor Arora. Vinay Chaukar. Shareen Mantri Kedia. Kanwal Kohli. Angarika Mantri. Sanjay Mehta. Mehjabeen Raja. Shefali Singh. Reza Tashakkori. Ajay R. Yadav

Production Namah Picture. Zee Studio
